title: InitializeBACnetString (Function)
text:
FUNCTION InitializeBACnetString : BOOL
Initializes a IEC_BACNET_STRING according to a given WSTRING. Only UTF-8 and ISO 8859-1 BACnet-String supported right now.

rows.Name: strUTF16
rows.Comment:
The utf16 WSTRING (standard format for CODESYS WSTRINGs in
visus, etc.) to use for initialization.

rows: The string type to initialize the BACnet string with.

rows.Name: strBuffer
rows.Comment:
A buffer used during initialization in the end being used
for the initialized string data.

rows: The BACnet string to operate on.
